name: Happy Mice Test
description:
A little test project I did to try and learn how to make basic roaming AI with object avoidance. It's far from perfect and you might notice some jittering or weird behaviour.

The mice will run around the environment you build for them, eat the food you give them and sleep (often in groups).

Spawn Mouse - N

Spawn Food - F

Spawn Block - C

Spawn Circle - V

Scale Object Width - Q / SHIFT + Q

Scale Object Height - E / SHIFT + E

Rotate Object - R / SHIFT + R

Place Object - LMB

Cancel Placement - RMB

Exit Game - ESC
